question.title: Weather Type in Each Country
question.metaData: {"mysql":["Create table If Not Exists Countries (country_id int, country_name varchar(20))","Create table If Not Exists Weather (country_id int, weather_state int, day date)"],"mssql":["Create table Countries (country_id int, country_name varchar(20))","Create table Weather (country_id int, weather_state int, day date)"],"oraclesql":["Create table Countries (country_id int, country_name varchar(20))","Create table Weather (country_id int, weather_state int, day date)","ALTER SESSION SET nls_date_format='YYYY-MM-DD'"],"database":true,"name":"weather_type","pythondata":["Countries = pd.DataFrame([], columns=['country_id', 'country_name']).astype({'country_id':'Int64', 'country_name':'object'})","Weather = pd.DataFrame([], columns=['country_id', 'weather_state', 'day']).astype({'country_id':'Int64', 'weather_state':'Int64', 'day':'datetime64[ns]'})"],"postgresql":["\nCreate table If Not Exists Countries (country_id int, country_name varchar(20))\n","Create table If Not Exists Weather (country_id int, weather_state int, day date)"],"database_schema":{"Countries":{"country_id":"INT","country_name":"VARCHAR(20)"},"Weather":{"country_id":"INT","weather_state":"INT","day":"DATE"}}}
mysqlSchemas: Create table If Not Exists Countries (country_id int, country_name varchar(20))
Create table If Not Exists Weather (country_id int, weather_state int, day date)
Truncate table Countries
insert into Countries (country_id, country_name) values ('2', 'USA')
insert into Countries (country_id, country_name) values ('3', 'Australia')
insert into Countries (country_id, country_name) values ('7', 'Peru')

insert into Countries (country_id, country_name) values ('8', 'Morocco')
insert into Countries (country_id, country_name) values ('9', 'Spain')
Truncate table Weather
